question:
Consider the following statements about the Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB):
  1. It is a statutory body under the Department of Science and Technology (DST)
  2. The Board is chaired by the Secretary, Department of Science and Technology (DST)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The Science and Engineering Research Board has been created under the SERB Act 2008 of Parliament. It is an important milestone in the field of Science and Engineering. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The Board, chaired by Secretary, Department of Science and Technology (DST), is comprised of 17 members including seven Secretaries to the Government of India. It ensures proper funding made to researchers in the field of R&D, thereby greatly improving the responsiveness to the genuine needs of the researchers. SERB has also established different Fellowships and Awards to recognize scientists.
